title: Wedding Cake
description: Designed for weddings, tiered, decorated to match wedding theme/colors.

title: Anniversary Cake
description: Celebrates marriage milestones, may reflect years, similar to weddings.

title: Birthday Cake
description: Staple for birthdays, various shapes, sizes, flavors, adorned with candles.

title: Chocolate Cake
description: Classic favorite, made with cocoa or chocolate, rich and indulgent.

title: Red Velvet Cake
description: Distinctive red color, cocoa-infused, layered, cream cheese topping.

title: Cheese Cake
description: Dessert with crust, creamy filling of cream cheese, sugar, and eggs.

title: Fruit Cake
description: Delicious fruit-filled cake with a medley of flavors.

title: Caramel Delight Cake
description: Indulgent caramel-flavored cake with layers of sweetness.

title: Lemon Blueberry Cake
description: Refreshing combination of lemon and blueberry in a delightful cake.

title: Strawberry Shortcake
description: Classic dessert featuring fresh strawberries and light sponge cake.

title: Mint Chocolate Chip Cake
description: Decadent chocolate cake with a hint of mint and chocolate chips.

title: Coffee Walnut Cake
description: Rich coffee-infused cake with crunchy walnuts for added texture.
